Description: Vintage Ray Ban B&L Leathers Aviator Sunglasses with gold plated and leather frame, photochromic brown glass lenses that darken in direct sunlight engraved 'BL'. (in these photos the lenses appear light because they were not taken in sunlight - transitions / light-adaptive / variable tint ). Securely dispatched in padded card box postal packaging with original case.Condition: Excellent vintage condition with no significant marks on lenses.Size: At widest point 145mm, lens width 62mm.PayPal only please, items dispatched within 24 hours of payment Shipping to UK 2 days, EU 6 days, US and rest of the world 7 to 10 days with tracking code. No extra shipping charge for extra items (2 items for 1 charge, 3 items 1 charge, etc). Items will be sent to your PayPal delivery address unless I am notified otherwise. Regarding Vintage Ray Bans: - From 1937 to 1998 Ray Bans were made by an optics company called Bausch and Lomb in USA and France, hence the 'BL' engraving on vintage lenses. The 'Ray Ban' logo printed on the lens only appeared on later models from the 80's onwards, earlier examples with no lens logo printed are still genuine - From 1998 to present day Ray Bans have been made by a company called Luxottica in Italy, lenses inscribed with 'RB' By bidding on this auction, UK buyers agree to pay for postage if they choose to return the item. The outgoing post cost is not refunded, only the item value.International returns are not accepted.
